Name: Baffin Sinus
Source of name: Baffin Bay between Canada and Greenland

Name: Fagaloa Sinus
Source of name: Fagaloa Bay in Upolu Island, Samoa

Name: Flensborg Sinus
Source of name: Flensburg Firth, fjord between Denmark and Germany

Name: Fundy Sinus
Source of name: Bay of Fundy in Canada that hosts the world's largest tides[57]

Name: Gabes Sinus
Source of name: Gabes, or Syrtis minor, a bay in Tunisia

Name: Nicoya Sinus
Source of name: Gulf of Nicoya in Costa Rica

Name: Okahu Sinus
Source of name: Okahu Bay near Auckland, New Zealand

Name: Puget Sinus
Source of name: Puget Sound in Washington, United States

Name: Skelton Sinus
Source of name: Skelton Glacier near Ross Sea, Antarctica

Name: Trold Sinus
Source of name: Trold Fiord Formation in Nunavut, Canada

Name: Tumaco Sinus
Source of name: Tumaco, port city and bay in Colombia
